casebody.data:
Dec. 7, 1920. Hiram B. Currier v. Fred Silkey. The case was transferred from the May term, 1920, of the superior court upon an agreed statement of facts by Marble, J. The facts being considered insufficiently stated to raise the questions of law argued, the order was Holman & Smith, for the plaintiff. Nathaniel E. Martin, for the defendant.

Hillsborough,

Case discharged.
